site.title: KLIXNetwork - server hosting, VPS, domain
section.about-us.text:
Our purpose and philosophy is to provide flexible and safe service to our Customers that allow them to leave their business comfort zone in order to ensure and foster company development to achieve success.
Therefore we always follow and use the latest technology standards.
section.services.list: Renting Dedicated Servers - Renting VPS - Hosting - Customized Environment - IT service and advisory
section.services.server-renting.descript: We propose this service to those customers who are interested in having full control of a server with keeping the investments cost low. This can be achieved through a monthly payment construction and, at the same time, the cost will remain easily plannable.
section.services.vps.description1: With using VPS our customers have root access hence they are capable of installing their needed applications that is compatible with the system.
section.services.vps.description2: It is important to emphasize that the VPS is easy to customize and modify because itâ€™s a software based solution.
section.services.vps.description3: Furthermore the cost of a VPS is much lower than a dedicated server. Besides it is disadvantage that the hardware is shared among different VPSs.
section.services.it-service-advisory.des: Our IT service and advisory activity covers the following areas:
HW and SW system management, diagnostics
Helping customers to select an appropriate server configuration and OS for their needs
Remote system management, operation, update and maintenance

In case of this activity we prefer starting with a preliminary discussion between the Parties. It is important to check and assess the certain needs of the Customer through a personal meeting, phone call or email. This step is inevitable in order to find the best professional solution and practice for the customer with meeting cost effectiveness.
A proper offer can be provided only after the prior discussion.

section.support.reliability.description: DDoS protection, Diesel Power Generator, Redundant AC in the server room, CCTV, 24/7 guarded area
quotation: We build too many walls and not enough bridges.
